DIALOGS.EXPORT_ICAL_MESSAGE1: Please use the following address to access your calendar from other applications.

QUICKSTART.WELCOME: The most powerful calendar for Trello. Make your time organized.
QUICKSTART.DRAG_AND_DROP: Create new card by clicking an empty time or drag-and-drop any Trello card.
QUICKSTART.MULTIBOARD: Just click ‚ÄúBoards‚Äù to choose which of them you want to show on your calendar.
QUICKSTART.ALL_DAY: Set all-day cards by dragging to the top of the day. To make it multi-day drag border right or left.
QUICKSTART.FILTERS: Choose ‚ÄúEnable Trello Filters‚Äù and your cards are filtered the same in both Trello.
QUICKSTART.MONTHLY_VIEW: Monthly view gives you retrospective of your work for several weeks.
QUICKSTART.VERTICAL_VIEW: Vertical perspective helps you to see all the hours in a day more easily.

TOOLTIPS.CALENDAR_UNAVAILABLE_ON_BOARD: Planyway Calendar unavailable on this board
